name: Flee France
description:
This is the first game I made in an game engine called UPBGE. 

This is a short adventure game where you (the main character) have to escape occupied France(1943). You have to travel though landmines, guards, and the English channel to reach your end goal. Getting to Great Britain.

Controls:

w, a, s, d - move

Shift - sprint

Space - jump

Esc - quit the game
